I'm pretty sure this has been here for years.
There!\. I can still make it in time!
Hey there, do ya want some snow?
Aren't you freezing in that get-up?
Mhm, right, sure. Missing a top hat?
The cops wouldn't have an easier time!
I really don't have time for this.

Nothing short of 100%.\.

You have a snowman's guarantee.

Haha, not falling for that.
Try and scam someone else, snowman.
Scam?! This is high quality stuff!
You don't understand how hard it was to obtain this!
You're literally made of snow, dude.
If a snowman gave you snow from their body,
But I've already got ice at home.
Ugh, what a waste of time.
Hey, you were the one trying to sell to me.
I recommend being more respectful to your customers. Might just help you make some bucks.
Yeah, sorry if I sounded rude.
Good luck with your sales, snowman.
Oh come on, I'll give it at discount!
Ugh. What a waste of time.
Sorry, dude. I just really need to hand in this homework.
It's just homework, not like it's the end of the world.
You standing in my way when I'm in a rush.
I'm just a humble snowman trying to ply his trade! Got a problem with that?
When you're in my way, absolutely.
Now if you'll stop being a nuisance and move, that'll be great.
...\. Did you even have a childhood?
Oh, you mean from the Christmas song?
Well, now you know who I am.
Assignments wait for no one, snowman.
Aw come on, you know you want to see ol' Frosty ply his trade.
And I'm also convinced that you should try to enter a cosplay contest.
This carrot is the real deal.
I guess it's worth a shot right?
What's the worst that could happen.
I dunno, I'll melt under the spotlight?
I'll think over it some more...
If anyone seems deprived of their childhood, it's you, bud.
Well, I can't help that you walk around in a snowman expecting to sell something.
What I'm selling here is quality stuff.
My image has nothing to do with it, okay?!
You're puns are so bad, I'm getting a brain freeze.
Hope you trip on a snowglobe.
Where's my phone, I need to report this in.
Wait! Here's a deal.\. Free snow, no cops.\. Yes?
I only sell the highest quality products.
Good luck with the...\. Uh, submission.
Come on, I'm just a snowman!
See, now we're talking fresh sales. If I don't see you selling carrots next time...\.
Well, 3 numbers is all it takes.
Are you sure anyone's gonna buy from a cosplay like that?
Listen, it's a long way down from where I was.
You just need to find your answers.
Yeah, everyone stumbles now and then.
It's about how you pick yourself back up.
Mhm, what do you think you should try?
Cool. I'll try that, I guess. Gotta keep up with the market.
Clearly, you need to re-evaluate your life choices.
I mean, it's like what happens when a celebrity falls from fame.
I think you're overstating your position.
Kids used to go wild over me!
Well at least resident snowman here is stuck in his illusions of grandeur.
Hope you trip over a snowglobe.
THIS PAGE IS FOR AFTER CONVERSATION EVENTS
If you're going to be that way...
I don't need a magic top hat to make your life miserable!
You think you can just shove past me?
Now how does this go again...
I rigged this place with traps so I could laugh at suckers trying to race to class.\. But now that I know you're cool, it's uh,\. a \fibit\fi awkward.
Hold on, I can fix this.\. Don't move!
Luckily I don't need a magic top hat for this. Ha ha!
Now how does this go again...
